description: Manage Quota resource for Microsoft Azure Playwright Testing service account.

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace quota list
commands.summary: List quotas for a given workspace.
examples: az playwright-testing workspace quota list --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace quota show
commands.summary: Get quota by name for an workspace.
commands.syntax:
az playwright-testing workspace quota show [--ids]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--quota-name {Reporting, ScalableExecution}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
examples: az playwright-testing workspace quota show --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace --quota-name ScalableExecution
